PAD_KarlachSpotsDammon.synopsis: Karlach has the first upgrade and sees Dammon for the first time in the act after when she got it.
PAD_KarlachSpotsDammon.how_to_trigger: (Not implemented yet)In act 2: - Get first upgrade in act 1.- Go to haven.In act 3:- Get the first upgrade in act 1 or 2.- Not have the second upgrade.- Not seen him in act 2 if got the upgrade in act 1.- Go to his shop.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM.synopsis: Players find Dammon in HAV or LOW for the first or second time in the game with Karlach in your party. He will say that he knows a way to upgrade Karlach for the first or second time, depending on how her origin story evolved.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM.how_to_trigger: With Karlach in your party as an avatar or a companion (far from the party):- Load SCL_Main_A- Set up the tiefling path using the debug book- Speak with Dammon.or- Load CTY_Main_A- goto -7; 40; 5- Speak with Dammon.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested.synopsis: Nested dialog used for Karlach upgrades in Dammon's default dialogues.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested.how_to_trigger: With an infernal metal in the party inventory speak with Dammon and don't give it to him during the OM. Then speak with him and give it.

PAD_DammonInHaven.synopsis: Karlach tells the player that if the tieflings are in HAV Dammon might be there too after Mol appears in the checkpoint dialog.
PAD_DammonInHaven.how_to_trigger: 1. Load SCL_Main_A.2. Have Karlach in your party.3. In the debug book set up the tiefling path.4. goto -8; 28; 1194.5. If in editor: oe havchec5.  Go through the checkpoint dialog, it should trigger after it if Karlach is near and available.

PAD_FoundInfernalMetal.synopsis: Karlach mentions that the piece of infernal metal found could be given to Dammon.
PAD_FoundInfernalMetal.how_to_trigger: Players know that Dammon can help with Karlach's infernal engine and find a piece of infernal metal.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM.synopsis: Follow up OM between Karlach and Dammon to give her her upgrades if she has infernal metal in her inventory.
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM.how_to_trigger: Speak with Dammon once in each act with Karlach near and with some infernal metal in her inventory. Refuse to get the upgrade and speak with him again.

PAD_KarlachSpotsDammon_0.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachSpotsDammon_0.text: Hey, it's Dammon! Let's say hi.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_40.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_40.text: There you are. The infernal. I knew there must be one in the area. If we survive this, let's speak again. I'm a mechanic - we might be of use to one another.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_47.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_47.text: Thought I sensed an infernal around here. But you aren't from Elturel. What's your story?
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_47.context: NodeContext: Smelling the air, he can smell the infernal machinery on Karlach.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_95.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_95.text: I spent a good bit of time in the Hells. Enlisted against my will by the archdevil Zariel. Same as you, I suppose, if you're from Elturel.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_33.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_33.text: The devils were delighted when your city was swallowed up. I thought they had you for keeps. Glad you got out.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_55.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_55.text: I got lucky. It looks like you did too. And... you brought some infernal machinery with you.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_55.context: NodeContext: Sniffing once or twice, he smells Karlach's infernal war machine heart

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_2.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_2.text: A little gift from Zariel. Keeps me burning hot.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_2.context: NodeContext: "A little gift from Zariel" is with a bit of bile in your voice, though Karlach keeps things light. Lightly pounds chest with fist to indicate where the machine is.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_29.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_29.text: Very hot, by the smell of it. Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil. Mind if I take a listen?
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_29.context: NodeContext: Sniffing once or twice, he smells Karlach's infernal war machine heart

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_84.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_84.text: Be my guest. But don't get too close, or your eyes'll melt shut.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_34.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_34.text: Phew! You really are burning up. Whoever put that engine together tried to house metallurgised demono-valves inside a ra-gnax alloy casement. Very risky.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon approaches Karlach and leans his ear toward her chest, trying to listen to her heart. We hear its fire burning, cogs grinding, etc. After a moment, Dammon jerks away, feeling the heat of her.NodeContext: Ra-gnax: RAG-nax. metallurgised = i'm not sure how it's said in UK, i'd say 'metta-lur-gized' with roughly same emphasis on all syllables. demono-valves = de-MON-o-valves (nothing special here, just demonic valves).

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_16.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_16.text: I might be able to help, but I'd need infernal iron. And a prayer that my hammer'll survive the work.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_35.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_35.text: That thing isn't meant to operate outside Avernus. I'm not sure how much longer it'll keep running, the way it's going.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_8.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_8.text: Will you be able to turn down the temperature a little? Worried I'm gonna go in for a handshake and singe someone's arm off one of these days.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_1.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_1.text: I'd worry about surviving the night first. But help one, help both: if we can cool you off, it'll stabilise your engine and allow you to touch whomever you please.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_21.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_21.text: Hey soldier - I think we picked up some of that infernal iron already. What say you - should I give it to him?
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_21.context: NodeContext: Intonation: "Hey soldier" is calling for the player's attention, like "you there".

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_23.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_23.text: Absolutely - let's see what he can do.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_85.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_85.text: Hm - looks like it went missing. I'll be here if you find it.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_97.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_97.text: Where should we look for infernal iron?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_5.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_5.text: I've sensed some during our travels. It has a pull to it - absolutely magnetic, once you know what you're looking for. I can show you where I'd look.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_5.context: InternalNodeContext: This will be handled in the map/ journal UI, no need for any anims here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_9.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_9.text: I'm not sure. Should we be tampering with an infernal machine?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_13.text: You might be right. But... I'm running really hot. Might be nice if we could calm things down a little?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_42.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_42.text: We'll keep our eyes open for some iron.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_71.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_71.text: Meanwhile, I've still got plenty of weapons and armour in stock if you're looking to load up.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_76.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_76.text: Personally, I'd like to know what infernal iron is worth.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_45.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_45.text: Not much to a regular smith, but a fair bit to a canny buyer.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_53.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_53.text: Not that that matters. We want to use it, not sell it.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_54.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_54.text: Thought I sensed an infernal around here. But you aren't from Elturel. What's your story?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_52.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_52.text: Hey, I remember you. The weaponsmith, right? Your city was swallowed up by Avernus. And you were enlisted against your will, like my good self.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_11.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_11.text: I thought they had you for keeps. Glad you got out.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_10.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_10.text: I got lucky. It looks like you did too. And... you brought some infernal machinery with you.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_10.context: NodeContext: Sniffing once or twice, he smells Karlach's infernal war machine heart

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_90.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_90.text: A little gift from Zariel. Keeps me burning hot.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_90.context: NodeContext: "A little gift from Zariel" is with a bit of bile in your voice, though Karlach keeps things light. Lightly pounds chest with fist to indicate where the machine is.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_70.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_70.text: Very hot, by the smell of it. Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil. Mind if I take a listen?
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_70.context: NodeContext: Sniffing once or twice, he smells Karlach's infernal war machine heart

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_58.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_58.text: Be my guest. But don't get too close, or your eyes'll melt shut.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_36.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_36.text: Phew! You really are burning up. Whoever put that engine together tried to house metallurgised demono-valves inside a ra-gnax alloy casement. Very risky.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon approaches Karlach and leans his ear toward her chest, trying to listen to her heart. We hear its fire burning, cogs grinding, etc. After a moment, Dammon jerks away, feeling the heat of her.NodeContext: Ra-gnax: RAG-nax. metallurgised = i'm not sure how it's said in UK, i'd say 'metta-lur-gized' with roughly same emphasis on all syllables. demono-valves = de-MON-o-valves (nothing special here, just demonic valves).

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_93.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_93.text: I might be able to help, but I'd need infernal iron. And a prayer that my hammer'll survive the work.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_19.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_19.text: Will you be able to turn down the temperature a little? Worried I'm gonna go in for a handshake and singe someone's arm off one of these days.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_87.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_87.text: I'd worry about yourself first. That thing isn't meant to operate outside Avernus. I'm not sure how much longer it'll keep running, the way it's going.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_80.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_80.text: I'll see what I can do to give you more time if you find some infernal iron, but a machine that complicated is going to need serious work - more than a pauper's forge can handle.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_67.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_67.text: I think I picked up some of that infernal iron already. Can we at least see what you can do?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_64.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_64.text: Hm - looks like it went missing. I'll be here if you find it.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_62.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_62.text: I'll take whatever it is you're offering.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_74.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_74.text: I've sensed some during our travels. It has a pull to it - absolutely magnetic, once you know what you're looking for. I can show you where I'd look.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_30.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_30.text: Thanks, mate. You'll be seeing me again soon.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_89.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_89.text: Thought I sensed an infernal around here. But you aren't from Elturel. What's your story?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_50.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_50.text: I only recently escaped the Hells. I was enlisted against my will by the archdevil Zariel.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_24.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_24.text: Sounds familiar. When our city fell into Avernus, Zariel's commanders put me to work in their forges.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_27.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_27.text: Vicious bastards, the lot of them, but it helped that they thought I had some utility.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_51.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_51.text: They must've thought the same of you. That's infernal machinery I smell, isn't it? And running awfully hot. Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_4.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_4.text: Elturel - your city was swallowed up by Avernus, right?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_92.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_92.text: It didn't take 'em long to notice I had some utility and stick me in the forges.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_14.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_14.text: And, if you don't mind me saying, it seems they got to you too. There's infernal machinery inside you, right? Very, very hot infernal machinery.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_0.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_0.text: Be my guest. But don't get too close, or your eyes'll melt shut.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_96.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_96.text: That thing isn't meant to operate outside Avernus. I'm not sure how much longer it'll keep running, the way it's going.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_7.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_7.text: I have some infernal iron right here. Take it.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_18.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_18.text: Hm - looks like it went missing. I'll be here if you find it.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_46.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_46.text: Will you be able to turn down the temperature a little? I haven't touched anyone in a long time.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_39.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_39.text: I'd worry about surviving the night first. But help one, help both: if we can cool you off, it'll stabilise your engine and allow you to touch whomever you please.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_25.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_25.text: Where should I look for infernal iron?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_73.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_73.text: I've sensed some during our travels. It has a pull to it - absolutely magnetic, once you know what you're looking for. I can show you where I'd look.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_73.context: InternalNodeContext: This will be handled in the map/ journal UI, no need for any anims here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_82.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_82.text: Thanks a lot. I'll be back when I find that infernal iron.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_98.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_98.text: Looking forward to it. It's been a while since I was able to work with anything from the Hells. I won't say I miss it, but... well, maybe I do.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_41.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_41.text: Do you know what you're doing?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_94.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_94.text: I like to think so. Especially when I smell machinery running itself out like a miniature giant space hamster on a cosmic wheel.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_44.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_44.text: Didn't mean to overstep. Keep an eye on that thing, though. I don't like what I'm smelling - for your sake, that is.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_20.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_20.text: Meanwhile, I've still got plenty of weapons and armour in stock if you're looking to load up.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_32.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_32.text: Never mind my story. You sensed an infernal?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_69.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_69.text: Infernal machinery, anyway. Smells like it's running awfully hot. Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_72.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_72.text: And the closer you get, the stronger it smells.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_107.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_107.text: Mm. The weight of it. And that blaze of chaos. Can't imagine this where my heart should be. Must be quite the experience.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_20.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_20.text: Give me just a moment... and I think...
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: He forges the metal (CINE NOTE: See HAV_TieflingSurvivors_Weaponsmith, which already has animations for this that we can use here)InternalNodeContext: This branch is also in DEN_ForgingOfTheHeart_OM_KArlach_COM (N92)

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_121.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_121.text: There. You'll have to install it, I'm afraid. I don't think there are thick enough gloves in all the realms to protect from that kind of heat.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_121.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon hands the upgrade to Karlach (beneath camera) and Karlach fiddles with it near her chest area (not shown - shot from behind, maybe?). Mechanical clinking and grinding as she fits it in.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_30.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_30.text: That feels... good. I'm still burning hot as Hell's hole, but I feel less... changeable. Cheers, mate.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_118.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_118.text: Pleasure. And as for the heat, I haven't got any solutions now, but I'm not giving up. Could be if the combustion chamber had its own insulation, or if we had some kind of enchanted coolant...

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_17.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_17.text: Find me again in Baldur's Gate. If I'm worth my salt, I'll have figured something out by then.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_2.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_2.text: Let me sleep on it. I just might be able to work something out.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_61.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_61.text: Hopefully the next time I see you, I'll have something promising to report. I'll need more infernal iron either way, though, so keep your eyes open. Take care.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_13.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_13.text: Mm. The weight of it. And that blaze of chaos. Can't imagine this where my heart should be. Must be quite the experience.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach hands off the metal to Dammon (off screen), and he takes it (off screen - this can stay bronze). He holds it, enjoying the power of it.InternalNodeContext: This branch is also in DEN_ForgingOfTheHeart_OM_KArlach_COM (N27)

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_122.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_122.text: I'm still burning just as hot as ever.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_55.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_55.text: I can tune it up, but whether I can stop it from burning out is... up to the gods. That thing just wasn't meant to last in the Material Plane.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_12.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_12.text: Then again, I do love a challenge. Could be if the combustion chamber had its own insulation, or if the spark plug had a dampener... I'll give it some thought.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_111.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_111.text: You look good, too. Enjoy it - after spending time in Avernus, I know better than most that you deserve a good turn.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_41.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_41.text: That engine wasn't meant for this realm, though. And I'm not sure how much longer it's going to last, burning that hot.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_27.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_27.text: Well - all right. This shouldn't take long.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_27.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Karlach hands off the metal to Dammon (off screen), and he takes it (off screen - this can stay bronze).

He forges the metal (CINE NOTE: See HAV_TieflingSurvivors_Weaponsmith, which already has animations for this that we can use here)NodeContext: A little wary/ sad, because he has bad news for Karlach.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_6.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_6.text: Same as last time - you'll need to install it yourself. But this should do the trick.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon hands the upgrade to Karlach (beneath camera) and Karlach fiddles with it near her chest area (not shown - shot from behind, maybe?). Mechanical clinking and grinding as she fits it in.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_10.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_10.text: Only one way to find out.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_58.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: She inclines her head toward your hand and chokes up a little.NodeContext: Choking up

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_65.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_65.context: CinematicNodeContext: She inclines her head toward your hand and chokes up a little.NodeContext: Choking up

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_26.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: She hugs you strongly, her face buried in your neck as she begins to cry.NodeContext: Overwhelmed with emotion

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_35.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: She hugs you strongly, her face buried in your neck as she begins to cry.NodeContext: Overwhelmed with emotion

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_115.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player and karlach kiss passionately. NodeContext: When she speaks (after the kiss) she has tears in her eyes and his verklempt

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_101.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player and karlach kiss passionately. NodeContext: When she speaks (after the kiss) she has tears in her eyes and his verklempt

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_67.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_67.text: Can we go to bed now?
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_67.context:
NodeContext: Still crying but kinda making herself laugh too.
NOTE TO DIRECTOR:
We had to change the text of this line for gameplay reasons, but we really loved the original take and would like to reference it for hte re-record.
For reference, the original line's  UUID: h8605b090gbf19g43e5gb56fgaea68974604d

"Can we go to camp now?"

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_131.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_131.text: Hold on, Karlach. There's something I need to tell you.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_92.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_92.text: Ignot. Look at that. No fire.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_92.context: CinematicNodeContext: She reaches out and grasps the player's shoulder.NodeContext: Good-humored. She's calling you a weirdo. 'IG-not'

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_100.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_100.text: I can't believe it. Thank you, Dammon. Thank you so much.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_49.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_49.text: It's the least I could do.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_94.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_94.text: Before you go - there's something I need to tell you.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_125.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_125.text: That engine of yours - it's contained for the moment, but it's just too hot to exist here in the material plane indefinitely.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_106.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_106.text: I know you know that, but the thing is, there's a cure.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_5.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_5.text: I wasn't making any headway with the mechanics - none at all. The environment here is just too cold to sustain metals like the ones inside you.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_120.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_120.text: You have to return to Avernus - for good - or this thing is going to burn you up from the inside out. And sooner than you think.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_66.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_66.text: The minute I set foot back in Avernus, Zariel will force me back into service. I'm not doing her bidding again. I'd rather die.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_44.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_44.text: I get that. But don't rule it out. The world just might be better with you in it - even in Avernus.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_79.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_79.text: I won't stop trying to figure out a cure, but... at this point, I think we all have to face the inevitable.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_69.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_69.text: Yeah. Apart from the doom and gloom, you've given me more than I could ever hope to repay.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_73.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_73.text: It's been my pleasure. Good luck - both of you. Look after yourself, all right?

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_11.speaker: Player
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_11.text: We'll have to make the inevitable evitable, then.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_104.speaker: Player
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_104.text: First things first. Karlach, you have touch back. We ought to celebrate that.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_50.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_50.text: Right? All this doom and gloom. I have something far more exciting on my mind than this bloody tin box.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_50.context: NodeContext: A little uncertain. She means what she's saying but also papering over the weight of what she's just heard.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_71.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_71.text: Thanks, Dammon. Really. You've given me more than I could ever repay.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_114.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_114.text: Ignot. Look at that. No fire.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_114.context: CinematicNodeContext: She reaches out and grasps the player's shoulder.NodeContext: Good-humored. She's calling you a weirdo. 'IG-not'

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_31.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_31.text: Damn. I'm good. And you - you're very touchable.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_81.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_81.text: Thank you, Dammon. I can't tell you what this means to me.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_102.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_102.text: My pleasure. Before you go - there's something I need to tell you.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_64.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_64.text: That engine of yours - it's contained for the moment, but it's just too hot to exist here in the material plane indefinitely.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_98.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_98.text: I know you know that, but the thing is, there's a cure.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_25.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_25.text: I wasn't making any headway with the mechanics - none at all. The environment here is just too cold to sustain metals like the ones inside you.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_59.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_59.text: You have to return to Avernus - for good - or this thing is going to burn you up from the inside out. And sooner than you think.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_39.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_39.text: Isn't there anything you can do?

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_75.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_75.text: I can't say. I don't think anyone can. But when it's coming... you'll know.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_7.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_7.text: I don't know what to say.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_23.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_23.text: The minute I set foot back in Avernus, Zariel will force me back into service. I'm not doing her bidding again. I'd rather die.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_9.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_9.text: I get that. But don't rule it out. The world just might be better with you in it - even in Avernus.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_40.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_40.text: I won't stop trying to figure out a cure, but... at this point, I think I might be beaten.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_93.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_93.text: That isn't true. Anything can be beaten.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_86.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_86.text: I hope you're right, and I hope I'm wrong.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_108.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_108.text: Good luck, Karlach. Look after yourself, all right?

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_88.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_88.text: Say nothing. You're still trying to process what you've heard.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_74.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_74.text: You're going to let a bit of iron beat you?!

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_97.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_97.text: It's not any old iron, Karlach. This stuff belongs in the Hells, and unless it's taken back there, it's going to blow. No amount of tinkering is going to change that.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_3.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_3.text: I wish it could. I really, really do. Look after yourself, all right?

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_8.speaker: Jaheira
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_8.text: ...I am sorry, Karlach. Truly I am. But come - it is not a decision you must make this moment.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_8.context: NodeContext: Just heard that Karlach cannot be cured and will have to return to Avernus or die. Not trying to soften the blow or lie to her - just expressisng genuine sympathy and trying to help her focus on the path forward.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_18.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_18.text: We are all dust or ash in the end. Make your enemies burn while your heart still beats, and it will be a good life, no matter how brief.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_18.context: NodeContext: slightly mournful but pragmatic - this is Minthara's idea of a pep talk for a terminally ill companion. Delivered sincerely.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_38.speaker: Lae'zel
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_38.text: A warrior of your talents does not need looking after. You only need the next battle, then the next, then the next.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_70.speaker: Wyll
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_70.text: Together, we are mightier than even the fires of Avernus. We will overcome, Karlach - I promise you.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_78.speaker: Shadowheart
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_78.text: Come on, Karlach. There's got to be more to this - some other way.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_87.speaker: Gale
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_87.text: An all-too-familiar tale. I refuse to believe we cannot alter the ending.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_87.context: NodeContext: Determination (thinking of the parallels between Karlach's dilemma and his own)

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_123.speaker: Minsc
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_123.text: So bright a warrior needs no looking after. But... Boo and I will have her back, just in case.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_123.context: NodeContext: Bravado for a fellow warrior he respects - second line a gentler affirmation that she'll be missed when she's gone

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_130.speaker: Halsin
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_130.text: Her will is strong - even now, she defies the bounds of the material plane. She will prevail.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_32.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_32.text: Pause. Is he flirting with you?

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_72.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_72.text: Ahem - look, Karlach, there's something I need to tell you.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_47.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_47.text: Take your leave - you have someone you really want to touch.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_19.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_19.text: Hold on, Karlach. There's something I need to tell you.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_110.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_110.text: Well - all right. This shouldn't take long.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_110.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Karlach hands off the metal to Dammon (off screen), and he takes it (off screen - this can stay bronze).

He forges the metal (CINE NOTE: See HAV_TieflingSurvivors_Weaponsmith, which already has animations for this that we can use here)NodeContext: A little wary/ sad, because he has bad news for Karlach.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_14.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_14.text: Same as last time - you'll need to install it yourself. But this should do the trick.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon hands the upgrade to Karlach (beneath camera) and Karlach fiddles with it near her chest area (not shown - shot from behind, maybe?). Mechanical clinking and grinding as she fits it in.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_48.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_48.text: Go on. Give us your hand.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon holds up his hand. Karlach holds hers up to his, their palms touching.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_37.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_37.text: Damn. I'm good. And you - you're very touchable.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_33.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_33.text: Still haven't lost it, after all these years. Thanks, Dammon.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_42.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_42.text: Before you go - there's something I need to tell you.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_29.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_29.text: The minute I set foot back in Avernus, Zariel will force me back into service. I'm not doing her bidding again. I'd rather die.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_99.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_99.text: Nothing is inevitable. Especially not this.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_90.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_90.text: Mm. The weight of it. And that blaze of chaos. Can't imagine this where my heart should be. Must be quite the experience.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_83.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_83.text: Give me just a moment... and I think...
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_83.context: CinematicNodeContext: He forges the metal (CINE NOTE: See HAV_TieflingSurvivors_Weaponsmith, which already has animations for this that we can use here)InternalNodeContext: This branch is also in DEN_ForgingOfTheHeart_OM_KArlach_COM (N92)

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_51.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_51.text: There. You'll have to install it, I'm afraid. I don't think there are thick enough gloves in all the realms to protect from that kind of heat.
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon hands the upgrade to Karlach (beneath camera) and Karlach fiddles with it near her chest area (not shown - shot from behind, maybe?). Mechanical clinking and grinding as she fits it in.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_105.speaker: Karlach
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_105.text: That feels... good. I'm still burning hot as Hell's hole, but I feel less... changeable. Cheers, mate.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_119.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_119.text: Pleasure. And as for the heat, I haven't got any solutions now, but I'm not giving up. Could be if the combustion chamber had its own insulation, or if we had some kind of enchanted coolant...

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_4.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_4.text: Find me again in Baldur's Gate. If I'm worth my salt, I'll have figured something out by then.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_129.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_129.text: Take care, Karlach. And hopefully the next time I see you, I'll have something promising to report. Pocket any infernal iron you find along the way, hmm?

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_54.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_54.text: Let me sleep on it. I just might be able to work something out.

KarlachUpgrades_Nested_109.speaker: Dammon
KarlachUpgrades_Nested_109.text: Hopefully the next time I see you, I'll have something promising to report. I'll need more infernal iron either way, though, so keep your eyes open. Take care.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_1.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_1.text: Aha - thought I sensed an infernal. What are you doing here?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_147.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_147.text: Same thing as you, I reckon. Trying to stay out of the shadows.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_144.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_144.text: Hold on - I know you. The weaponsmith, right? Drafted into the Blood War when your city was swallowed by Avernus. Not too different from my own story.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_250.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_250.text: Well done making it out alive.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_96.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_96.text: Same to you. Though unless my senses deceive me, you brought a bit of the Hells back with you. Infernal engine?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_88.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_88.text: Who needs a heart when you've got one of these to keep you warm. Thank you, Zariel.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_88.context: NodeContext: Dripping with sarcasm. Lightly pounds chest on 'one of these'.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_162.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_162.text: Forget warm - you're burning up. Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil. Mind if I take a listen?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_192.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_192.text: Please do. I've been dying to find an infernal mechanic.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_192.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon approaches Karlach and leans his ear toward her chest, trying to listen to her heart. We hear its fire burning, cogs grinding, etc. After a moment, Dammon jerks away, feeling the heat of her.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_237.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_237.text: Phew! You really are burning up. Whoever put that engine together tried to house metallurgised demono-valves inside a ra-gnax alloy casement. Very risky.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_177.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_177.text: I could try to sort you out, but I'll need some infernal iron and a lot of luck.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_198.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_198.text: Infernal iron, eh? I can swing that. Will come back with command in tow and take it from there. Thanks, Dammon - you don't know what this means.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_70.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_70.text: I sensed some iron in the area when we arrived here - but I'm not sure if it's still there, now that we've been holed up. But I'll show you where I'd look.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_11.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_11.text: Karlach! I thought you'd be in the city by now. We were ambushed by cultists. Half of us were captured, the other half ran here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_262.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_262.text: Gods, I'm glad to see you again. There's something I have to tell you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_18.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_18.text: There you are. I was wondering where you'd run off to.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_13.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_13.text: No surprise you'd find me renting a room off the local diabolist I suppose. But you've found me now, and there's something I need to tell you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_150.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_150.text: Well... two things. Good news and bad news.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_7.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_7.text: I only need one more piece of infernal iron to craft an insulating chamber that could make it possible for you to - well, touch people.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_30.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_30.text: That's all I needed to hear. I'll be back with some infernal iron.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_112.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_112.text: Hang on - I think you'll want to hear the bad news, too.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_216.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_216.text: Ah, it'll keep. I have infernal iron to find.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_109.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_109.text: You think wrong! Thanks Dammon; I'll be back.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_160.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_160.text: Well - all right. But don't be long, Karlach.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_166.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_166.text: Head off before he can say another word.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_58.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_58.text: I've got the iron right here. Let's make this happen.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_90.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_90.text: Did you misplace it? I'll be here if you find it again - just shout.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_248.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_248.text: Any idea where I should look for the last piece?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_252.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_252.text: I sensed some in the area when we arrived here - but I'm not sure if it's still there, now that we've been holed up. But I'll show you where I'd look.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_253.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_253.text: That's amazing! How did you figure it out?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_64.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_64.text: Pure tiefling ingenuity. That engine of yours is like nothing I've ever encountered - hard to change, but possible to... enhance.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_156.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_156.text: Good news is my favourite kind.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_23.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_23.text: There you are. I was wondering where you'd run off to.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_106.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_106.text: Dammon! Thank the gods. I've been looking for you everywhere.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_0.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_0.text: No surprise you'd find me renting a room off the local diabolist I suppose. But you've found me now, and there's something I need to tell you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_20.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_20.text: I only need one more piece of infernal iron to craft an insulating chamber that could make it possible for you to -

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_114.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_114.text: Oh my gods. It's really happening. It's been so long. I'll be back as soon as I've got the goods in tow.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_86.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_86.text: Hang on - I think you'll want to hear the bad news, too.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_56.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_56.text: Ah, it'll keep. I have infernal iron to find.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_68.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_68.text: Karlach, believe me, this isn't something you should -

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_260.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_260.text: Oh my gods. It's really happening. It's been so long. Just a sec - let me find my pals. I'll be right back!

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_42.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_42.text: Argh - at least let me show you where to look. I'm not sure the infernal iron will still be there, but I can show you a few places of interest.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_42.context: NodeContext: Frustrated with Karlach cause she's not listening, but does still want to help her.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_24.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_24.text: There you are. I was wondering where you'd run off to.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_269.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_269.text: Dammon! Thank the gods. I've been looking for you everywhere.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_180.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_180.text: No surprise you'd find me renting a room off the local diabolist I suppose. But you've found me now, and there's something I need to tell you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_43.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_43.text: Karlach! I thought you'd be in the city by now. We were ambushed by cultists. Half of us were captured, the other half ran here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_36.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_36.text: Off the anvil, into the forge. We'll find them - hopefully.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_12.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_12.text: Before you run off into the belly of the beast, there's something I need to tell you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_183.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_183.text: Well... two things. Good news and bad news.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_202.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_202.text: I only need one more piece of infernal iron to craft an insulating chamber that could make it possible for Karlach to -

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_28.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_28.text: Oh my gods. It's really happening. It's been so long. So c'mon, let's get this show on the road - we need to find that iron!

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_189.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_189.text: Hang on - I think you'll want to hear the bad news, too.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_228.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_228.text: Ah, it'll keep. I have infernal iron to find.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_182.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_182.text: Karlach, believe me, this isn't something you should -

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_84.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_84.text: Oh my gods. It's really happening. It's been so long. We've got the iron - let's do this thing!

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_73.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_73.text: Yeah, sure, but first - fix me. Please.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_66.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_66.text: Go on, give him the iron. Let's make this happen.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_67.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_67.text: Did you misplace it? I'll be here if you find it again - just shout.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_49.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_49.text: Let's let Dammon speak. This sounds important.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_214.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_214.context: NodeContext: A little irritated. She doesn't want bad news.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_117.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_117.text: I don't enjoy saying this, Karlach, but there's no two ways about it: your engine is going to blow, and I can't fix it. I'm not sure anyone can.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_32.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_32.text: It's simply too hot to exist here in the material plane. Unless you return to Avernus - for good - this thing is going to blow. Sooner rather than later.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_175.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_175.text: But - but still, you can give me something that'll let me touch again, right? Safely?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_223.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_223.text: That's all I need to know. Do it. Please.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_149.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_149.text: Karlach, did you hear what Dammon said? Your engine is going to explode - soon.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_145.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_145.text: I never wanted to live forever. I just want to live good.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_27.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_27.text: This can wait - we have more important things to handle first.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_164.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_164.text: Nothing is more important than this. Not to me.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_123.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_123.text: It can wait and so can you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_136.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_136.text: Ew, no! Good news, please, my good man.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_196.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_196.text: Which do you want to hear first, Karlach?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_143.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_143.text: Would be a lot better if you'd find a way to fix this engine, Dammon.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_240.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_240.text: I haven't stopped trying, but all roads lead to a dead end. Sorry - I didn't mean -
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_240.context: NodeContext: CAtching himself after saying 'dead end' since Karlach is going to die.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_51.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_51.text: Never mind. I'm glad you're set up for the long run, in any case. One of us should be.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_125.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_125.text: It's the best situation I've had in years, honestly. Mistress of the house lets me operate from here for a fair price. I'd be lying if I said I wasn't happy.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_17.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_17.text: I... I don't know how this is going to end for you. For any of us, really. But I know I'd be dead without you, several times over.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_75.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_75.text: Thanks to you, I'm feeling well.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_142.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_142.text: Couldn't be happier to hear that.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_104.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_104.text: Glad to see you're so well set-up here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_38.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_38.text: Best I've had in years. Mistress of the house lets me operate from here for a fair price. I'd be lying if I said I wasn't happy.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_87.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_87.text: I haven't stopped trying to think of something that could help your engine last it out, by the way. But so far, all roads lead to a dead end. Sorry - I didn't mean -
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_87.context: NodeContext: CAtching himself after saying 'dead end' since Karlach is going to die.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_213.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_213.text: Never mind. I'm glad you're set up for the long run, in any case. One of us should be.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_153.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_153.text: Thanks, Karlach. I... I don't know how this is going to end for you. For any of us, really. But I know I'd be dead without you, several times over.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_236.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_236.text: In another life, I would've liked to... well. It doesn't matter now. Good luck, Karlach. And thank you. Again.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_61.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_61.text: Heavens above - there you are, Karlach! I was so hoping you'd come find me. I saw you you lot in Last Light, but didn't want to distract you from the fight against Ketheric.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_234.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_234.text: Thank you for saving us - again.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_155.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_155.text: Wouldn't leave you folks behind - not ever.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_82.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_82.text: Karlach! I thought you'd got lost in the shadows. Glad to see you made it through all right.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_194.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_194.text: Would be a lot better if you'd find a way to fix this engine, Dammon.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_194.context: NodeContext: Good natured but sincere longing for a solution

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_249.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_249.text: I haven't stopped trying, but all roads lead to a dead end. Sorry - I didn't mean -
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_249.context: NodeContext: CAtching himself after saying 'dead end' since Karlach is going to die.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_221.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_221.text: Never mind. Glad you're all right in any case. Nice forge you've got here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_60.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_60.text: Best I've had in years. Mistress of the house lets me operate from here for a fair price. I'd be lying if I said I wasn't happy.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_258.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_258.context: NodeContext: Warmly with ab ittersweet twist. She's glad Dammon is happy but sorry he can't fix her.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_256.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_256.text: Would be a lot better if you'd find a way to fix this engine, Dammon.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_256.context: NodeContext: Good natured but sincere longing for a solution

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_22.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_22.text: I haven't stopped trying, but all roads lead to a dead end. Sorry - I didn't mean -
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_22.context: NodeContext: CAtching himself after saying 'dead end' since Karlach is going to die.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_122.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_122.text: Never mind. Glad you're all right in any case. Nice forge you've got here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_62.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_62.text: Best I've had in years. Mistress of the house lets me operate from here for a fair price. I'd be lying if I said I wasn't happy.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_215.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_215.context: NodeContext: Warmly with ab ittersweet twist. She's glad Dammon is happy but sorry he can't fix her.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_83.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_83.text: Take a look at what I've got on offer, while you're here. Might be you find something useful to you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_127.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_127.text: Aha - thought I sensed an infernal. What are you doing here?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_111.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_111.text: Same thing as you, I reckon. Trying to stay out of the shadows.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_226.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_226.text: Hold on - I know you. The weaponsmith, right? Drafted into the Blood War when your city was swallowed by Avernus. Not too different from my own story.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_210.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_210.text: Well done making it out alive.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_176.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_176.text: Same to you. Though unless my senses deceive me, you brought a bit of the Hells back with you. Infernal engine?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_6.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_6.text: Who needs a heart when you've got one of these to keep you warm. Thank you, Zariel.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_6.context: NodeContext: Dripping with sarcasm. Lightly pounds chest on 'one of these'.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_130.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_130.text: Forget warm - you're burning up. Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil. Mind if I take a listen?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_233.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_233.text: Please do. I've been dying to find an infernal mechanic.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_233.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon approaches Karlach and leans his ear toward her chest, trying to listen to her heart. We hear its fire burning, cogs grinding, etc. After a moment, Dammon jerks away, feeling the heat of her.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_231.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_231.text: Now that's hot. Too hot. I think I could sort you out, but I'll need some infernal iron and a lot of luck.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_134.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_134.text: Hey soldier - we've got some infernal iron already. Let's give it to him, hey?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_14.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_14.text: Absolutely - let's see what his upgrade involves.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_98.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_98.text: Hm - might be you've misplaced it? I'll be here when it turns up again.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_235.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_235.text: I'm not sure. Should we be tampering with an infernal machine?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_119.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_119.text: Yes. Yes we should. I feel like I'm about to blow in more ways than one.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_267.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_267.text: If you're sure, then let's do it.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_3.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_3.text: Let's think about it first - we don't want to do something we can't take back.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_251.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_251.text: Yes we do. We absolutely do. I need help, and I'm going to get it. Got it?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_187.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_187.text: Fall in line. We have higher priorities.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_188.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_188.text: Sure. Meantime, if you need to stock up, everything I have is available.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_146.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_146.text: Any idea where we can find some infernal iron?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_191.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_191.text: As a matter of fact, I think I might. I've sensed some in the area. It has a pull to it - absolutely magnetic, once you know what you're looking for. I can show you where I'd look.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_37.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_37.text: Shout if you need anything else.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_138.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_138.text: Karlach! I thought you'd be in the city by now. We were ambushed by cultists. Half of us were captured, the other half ran here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_40.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_40.text: Off the anvil, into the forge. We'll find them - hopefully.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_107.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_107.text: Before you run off into the belly of the beast, there's something I need to tell you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_139.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_139.text: Well... two things. Good news and bad news.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_168.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_168.text: Heavens above - there you are, Karlach! I was so hoping you'd come find me.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_115.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_115.text: Thank you for saving us - again.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_169.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_169.text: Wouldn't leave you folks behind - not ever.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_217.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_217.text: Heavens above - there you are, Karlach! I was so hoping you'd come find me. I saw you you lot in Last Light, but didn't want to distract you from the fight against Ketheric.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_224.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_224.text: Aha - thought I sensed an infernal. Karlach, right? Without you lot, I'd've been toast twice over. First in the druid's grove, then at Last Light Inn.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_54.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_54.text: Thank you for saving my life. But I have to ask... what are you doing here?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_167.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_167.text: We have business in the city. Same as you, by the looks of things. Nice forge you have here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_225.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_225.text: Karlach! I thought you'd got lost in the shadows. Glad to see you made it through all right.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_171.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_171.text: Barely. Many of us weren't so lucky. We were ambushed by cultists. Those of us who didn't fall in the fight were dragged off - a few of us fled and made it here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_246.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_246.text: That's terrible. If we can help them, we will.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_184.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_184.text: I can still help with that upgrade, if you've found some infernal iron.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_29.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_29.text: I was hoping you'd say that.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_31.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_31.text: I'll come back when I've got the iron and my team in tow. They'll definitely want to see what happens!

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_232.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_232.text: Aha - thought I sensed an infernal. Karlach, right? Without you lot, I'd've been toast twice over. First in the druid's grove, then at Last Light Inn.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_185.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_185.text: Thank you for all you've done for us - for me. But I have to ask... what are you doing here?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_128.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_128.text: We have business in the city. Same as you, by the looks of things. Nice forge you have here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_48.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_48.text: No surprise you'd find me renting a room off the local diabolist I suppose - hey... do I smell infernal iron?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_2.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_2.text: I have business in this cursed wasteland, if you can believe it.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_270.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_270.text: There's little I don't believe any more. For example... is that infernal iron I smell?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_78.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_78.text: Hold on - I know you. The weaponsmith, right? Drafted into the Blood War when your city was swallowed by Avernus.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_33.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_33.text: You must have a similar story. Unless my senses deceive me, you brought a bit of the Hells back with you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_72.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_72.text: Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil. Mind if I take a listen?
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon approaches Karlach and leans his ear toward her chest, trying to listen to her heart. We hear its fire burning, cogs grinding, etc. After a moment, Dammon jerks away, feeling the heat of her.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_121.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_121.text: Phew! You really are burning up. Whoever put that engine together tried to house metallurgised demono-valves inside a ra-gnax alloy casement. Very risky.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_45.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_45.text: I could try to sort you out, but I'll need some infernal iron and a lot of luck.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_132.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_132.text: In fact, I've got a piece on me now. Let's do this.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_208.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_208.text: Hm - might be you've misplaced it? I'll be here when it turns up again.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_53.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_53.text: I should be thanking you. I'd love to get my hands on something other than pauper's ore...

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_148.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_148.text: Any idea where I can score some infernal iron?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_95.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_95.text: As a matter of fact, I think I might. I've sensed some in the area. It has a pull to it - absolutely magnetic, once you know what you're looking for. I can show you where I'd look.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_195.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_195.text: Looking for help with this hot tin tub I call my heart.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_35.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_35.text: I thought I smelled infernal iron.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_255.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_255.text: Karlach! I thought you'd got lost in the shadows. Glad to see you made it through all right.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_265.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_265.text: Barely. Many of us weren't so lucky. We were ambushed by cultists. Those of us who didn't fall in the fight were dragged off - a few of us fled and made it here.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_93.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_93.text: That's terrible. If we can help them, we will.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_152.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_152.text: I can still help with that upgrade, if you've found some infernal iron.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_159.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_159.text: I was hoping you'd say that.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_266.speaker: Dammon
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_266.text: Thought I sensed an infernal around here. I wanted to introduce myself after you helped us in the druid's grove, but I didn't get the chance.

PAD_DammonInHaven_0.speaker: Karlach
PAD_DammonInHaven_0.text: Hey! Dammon might be knocking around here, right?

PAD_DammonInHaven_1.speaker: Karlach
PAD_DammonInHaven_1.text: Hey, that weaponsmith you mentioned might be here, right?

PAD_FoundInfernalMetal_0.speaker: Karlach
PAD_FoundInfernalMetal_0.text: Infernal metal! This can help Dammon patch up my engine.

PAD_FoundInfernalMetal_1.speaker: Karlach
PAD_FoundInfernalMetal_1.text: Yes! Dammon can use this to fix me!

PAD_FoundInfernalMetal_2.speaker: Karlach
PAD_FoundInfernalMetal_2.text: Infernal metal! That's what my engine's made of. Hang on to that!

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_17.speaker: Dammon
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_17.text: Bring your friends if you've found some infernal iron. You shouldn't be alone, in case anything goes wrong.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_18.speaker: Dammon
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_18.text: Bring your friends if you want me to take a look at that engine after all. You shouldn't be alone, in case anything goes wrong.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_19.speaker: Dammon
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_19.text: You're back! Thank the gods. I feared the worst. If we both survive this horror, let's speak again - please.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_36.speaker: Player
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_36.text: I found the infernal iron you mentioned.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_6.speaker: Dammon
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_6.text: I'm not seeing any. Do let me know if it turns up.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_26.speaker: Player
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_26.text: Would you be able to take a look at Karlach's heart?

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_43.speaker: Dammon
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_43.text: Maybe, but I'd need infernal iron. And a prayer that my hammer'll survive the work.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_38.speaker: Player
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_38.text: Thanks, Dammon. We'll keep our eyes open.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_8.speaker: Karlach
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_8.text: I found the infernal iron you mentioned.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_5.speaker: Dammon
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_5.text: I'm not seeing any. Do let me know if it turns up.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_12.speaker: Karlach
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_12.text: I changed my mind. Perhaps you'd like to check out my infernal engine after all?

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_10.speaker: Dammon
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_10.text: Certainly, if it's all right with you. Let me have a listen.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_14.speaker: Dammon
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_14.text: Phew! You really are burning up. Whoever put that engine together tried to house metallurgised demono-valves inside a ra-gnax alloy casement. Very risky.
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dammon approaches Karlach and leans his ear toward her chest, trying to listen to her heart. We hear its fire burning, cogs grinding, etc. After a moment, Dammon jerks away, feeling the heat of her.NodeContext: RAG-nax

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_9.speaker: Dammon
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_9.text: That thing isn't meant to operate outside Avernus. I'm not sure how much longer it'll keep running, the way it's going.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_34.speaker: Dammon
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_34.text: I might be able to help, but I'd need infernal iron. And a prayer that my hammer'll survive the work.

FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_42.speaker: Karlach
FollowUp_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM_42.text: Thanks - I'll try to find some right away.
